front.title: Certification of Standard Reference Material 917d D-Glucose (Dextrose)

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: Standard Reference Material (SRM) 917d D-Glucose (Dextrose) is certified as a chemical substance of known high purity. It is intended for use in calibrating measuring systems for glucose determinations employed in clinical analysis. A unit of SRM 917d consists of one bottle containing 50 g of crystalline D-glucose. This publication documents the production, analytical methods, and computations involved in characterizing this product.

seriesInfo.name: NIST special publication; NIST special pub; NIST SP
